ValidationRule.description: If an hourly Ancillary Billing case is Resolved without Actual Hours being entered in Opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CONTAINS(TEXT(Case__r.Case_Type__c ), "Ancillary Billing") && ISNULL( Actual_Hours_Worked__c ) && CONTAINS(RecordTypeId, "01237000000RiRo") && ISPICKVAL( Case__r.Status , "Resolved")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Actual Hours must be entered to start billing case before Ancillary Billing parent case can be resolved
